QuestData.Title: Huck Wheelbarrow
QuestData.Description: Usually our trainees are adventurers like yourself, or monks from Tian Monastery, or occasionally retired Shado-Pan. Very rarely, though, we will greet trainees that have no fighting experience whatsoever.$b$bHuck Wheelbarrow is one such trainee. He has requested a duel with you. Look for him on the island's western shore.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: An immigrant from the farmlands, to the north.
